params.tokenContract: The token contract on which the base metadata URI was set.

setBaseMetadataURI(address,string).details: Reverts with {NotTargetContractOwner} if the sender is not the owner of the token contract.Emits a {BaseMetadataURISet} event.

params.tokenContract: The token contract on which to set the base metadata URI.
The token contract for which to retrieve the token URI.

returns.tokenURI: The token metadata URI as the concatenation of the base metadata URI and the token identifier.

NotTargetContractOwner(address,address).notice: Thrown when an account is not the target contract owner but is required to.

TargetIsNotAContract(address).notice: Thrown when the target contract is actually not a contract.

BaseMetadataURISet(address,string).notice: Emitted when the base metadata URI is set.

tokenMetadataURI(address,uint256).notice: Gets the token metadata URI for a token as the concatenation of the base metadata URI and the token identifier.

userdoc.notice: Token Metadata Resolver which uses a base metadata URI concatenated with the token identifier to produce a token metadata URI.Only the owner of the target token contract can set the base metadata URI for this target contract.
